paint

public void paint(javax.microedition.lcdui.Graphics g)
Description copied from class: Component
Paint is called by the container of the component to allow it to draw itself on Graphics g The drawable area on g is (0,0,width,height).

getMinSize

public int[] getMinSize()
Description copied from class: Component
The minSize is used to calculate the layout of the components inside their container by the LayoutManager. The minSize is only used when the prefSize is not set. If the prefSize is set it will be used even if the minSize is bigger than prefSize.

Overrides:
getMinSize in class Component
Returns:
the minSize dimensions of this Component.

getContentWidth

public int getContentWidth()
Description copied from class: Component
Returns the width of the usefull content of this component (i.e. for a TextComponent the width of the text without borders,etc) It is used by the LayoutManager and the Browser to determine the best way to display this component

Overrides:
getContentWidth in class Component
Returns:
